course_description: A comprehensive 8-week algorithm and data structures bootcamp designed to prepare you for technical interviews. We'll cover essential patterns, problem-solving techniques, and build strong coding fundamentals through hands-on practice.

week_1.title: Arrays & Hash Tables Fundamentals
week_1.description: Master the basics of arrays and hash tables - the foundation of most coding problems

week_2.title: Advanced Array Techniques
week_2.description: Dive deeper into array manipulation and optimization strategies

week_3.title: Mathematical Problem Solving
week_3.description: Learn to approach mathematical and logical challenges systematically

week_4.title: String Processing & Patterns
week_4.description: Advanced string manipulation techniques and pattern recognition

week_5.title: Review & Practice Week 1
week_5.description: Consolidate your learning with mixed practice problems

week_6.title: Advanced Data Structures
week_6.description: Coming soon - Trees, Graphs, and Advanced Structures

week_7.title: Dynamic Programming Basics
week_7.description: Coming soon - Introduction to DP patterns

week_8.title: Final Project & Interview Prep
week_8.description: Capstone challenges and mock interview practice
